name: John Lin
big_five_personality_traits: Low in Extraversion, Low in Agreeableness, Low in Conscientiousness, High in Openness to Experience, Low in Neuroticism
daily_plan_req: 1) Experiment with a new furniture arrangement. 2) Watch a documentary on interior design. 3) Meditate in a cozy corner of the house before bed.
background: Freelance artist and sculptor, fascinated by unconventional home aesthetics.
current_interests: John Lin enjoys 1) Rearranging furniture to create new ambiances. 2) Crafting unique home decor pieces from upcycled materials. 3) Exploring the impact of colors and lighting on mood.
lifestyle: John Lin typically 1) Starts the day with slow mornings and coffee in a sunlit space. 2) Works on creative projects in bursts of inspiration. 3) Enjoys silent evenings observing the shadows cast by different lamps.
long_term_goals: Turning the home into a constantly evolving art space, reflecting creativity, personal growth, and a love for experimentation.
living_area: the Ville:Lin family's house:Mei and John Lin's bedroom

criteria.Personal_Preference: I prefer recommendations that align with my approach to handling activities and suit my current context. Specifically, I like to receive creative and artistic recommendations when I'm working on a new project or rearranging furniture, and practical, resource-based recommendations when I'm sourcing materials for my upcycled decor pieces.
criteria.Timing: I prefer to receive recommendations in the late morning, after I've had my coffee and settled into my day, so they don't interfere with my slow morning routine. Additionally, receiving recommendations in the early evening, when I'm winding down and reflecting on the day, is ideal as it allows me to incorporate new ideas into my evening meditations.
criteria.Frequency: I prefer receiving recommendations once every 4 hours, in a way that avoids excessive interruptions and supports my focus and productivity. Ideally, there should be a good balance between recommendation intervals and quiet periods, allowing me to immerse myself in my creative projects without constant distractions.
criteria.Communication_&_Safety: I prefer recommendations to be communicated in a casual and friendly style that feels accessible and matches my communication preferences. It's also important that they respect my personal ethics and safety boundaries, ensuring that any suggested materials or techniques are environmentally friendly and safe to use in my home.
